results.title: Isolated systolic hypertension in the elderly: new insights.
results.text_hl: The results of the SHEP study, recently published, demonstrate positive effects of treatment in @<m>DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@ISH@@@, as @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ (-35%) and all cardiovascular events (-32%) were significantly reduced by low-dose @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlortalidone@@@ alone or associated to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Reserpine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012110 @@@reserpine@@@.
